GENERAL

Valliammai Engineering College: Lecture on ‘Virtual instrumentation using lab view, Kattankulathur, 2 p.m.

Saveetha School of Management: Inauguration of ‘Pride 2k16 Rendezvous Management fest’, Poonamallee High Rd., 10 a.m.

Soka Ikeda College of Arts and Science for Women: Graduation day, Madhanangkuppam, 9 a.m.

D.R.B. Calavala Cunnan Chetty’s Hindu College: Programme on ‘Youth connect on Civic and Good Citizenship’, Pattabhiram, 10 a.m.

Uravu Surangam and Sri Krishna Sweets: Programme on ‘Sigarathai Thotta Sivasankari’, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Mylapore, 6.30 p.m.

Advocates Link Academy: Pattimanram, 322 Law Chamber 2{+n}{+d}Floor, Madras High Court, 4 p.m.

Periyar Library Reader’s Circle: Meeting, Periyar Thidal, Vepery, 6.30 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Divine School, Perumal Koil St., Pudur; CSI Inbarasu Aalayam, Tollgate; Puthiya Shakthi Group, Ezhil Nagar 3{+r}{+d}St., Kodungaiyur; Santhome Boys HSS., Santhome; and Philomina MHSS., Injambakkam, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Church of Christ, Anna Nagar; Chennai School, Arunachalam St., Chintadripet; Victory Child Development Centre, Muthalamman Koil St., Selaiyur; Church of Victorious Cross, Jawaharlal Nehru Salai, Ashok Nagar; St. Joseph Church, Cholapuram Rd., Ambattur; St. Sebastian Church, Madhavaram; Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Baby Nagar, Velachery; C.S.I. Church, Thiruvottiyur; and Christ Church, Porur, 7 p.m.
title: MRR/CHENNAI TODAY FOR FEBRUARY 25 (THURSDAY) FOR CHENNAI CITY FOR PAGE 4
